<p>November is here, which means <a data-i13n="cpos:1;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/the-best-tech-gifts-for-mom-that-shell-appreciate-for-the-rest-of-2025-130044756.html">gift giving season</a> is right around the corner, as is <a data-i13n="cpos:2;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/black-friday/">Black Friday</a>. The latter, though, may feel like it&#39;s already here thanks to all the deals you can already get right now. A few of the best ones are on Google devices, namely the latest Google flagship smartphones.</p> 
<p>Take the <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:3;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0FFTR1QB3&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=04e77a69-12b9-4933-9e48-6aafe604b9d9&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Google+Pixel+10+Pro+Fold&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0dvb2dsZS1QaXhlbC1Qcm8tRm9sZC1TbWFydHBob25lL2RwL0IwRkZUUjFRQjM_&amp;signature=AQAAARjNGjcfpoVKzaaI8UiSY6Kiyus9FR8K3EP1Yxf7TDNN&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FGoogle-Pixel-Pro-Fold-Smartphone%2Fdp%2FB0FFTR1QB3" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Google-Pixel-Pro-Fold-Smartphone/dp/B0FFTR1QB3?th=1">Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold</a>, which has only been out since late August. It&#39;s now down to $1,499 from $1,799 — a 17 percent discount. This deal is available at both Amazon and <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Best Buy;elmt:;cpos:4;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=5e0bed65-d2f8-4b34-9b8f-955218c0e37a&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=04e77a69-12b9-4933-9e48-6aafe604b9d9&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Best+Buy&amp;linkText=Best+Buy&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAffpvLlhDocvxCQ2SfOS66Vi5FfKdhWDeHkW9o7VRua-&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fproduct%2Fgoogle-pixel-10-pro-fold-256gb-unlocked-moonstone%2FJ39TC8JXSY" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.bestbuy.com/product/google-pixel-10-pro-fold-256gb-unlocked-moonstone/J39TC8JXSY">Best Buy</a>, and seems to be the first big markdown on the Pixel 10 Pro Fold. Notably, this deal is on the 256GB model, but the <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:5;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0FFTPXTVN&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=04e77a69-12b9-4933-9e48-6aafe604b9d9&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=512GB&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0dvb2dsZS1QaXhlbC1Qcm8tRm9sZC1TbWFydHBob25lL2RwL0IwRkZUUFhUVk4_&amp;signature=AQAAAXnNyMDIQk9WxzKiRa4rEDIPm17QvNDq7MbQQgnHUokj&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FGoogle-Pixel-Pro-Fold-Smartphone%2Fdp%2FB0FFTPXTVN" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Google-Pixel-Pro-Fold-Smartphone/dp/B0FFTPXTVN?th=1">512GB</a> and <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:6;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0FFTRZHMW&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=04e77a69-12b9-4933-9e48-6aafe604b9d9&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=1TB+Pixel+10+Pro+Folds&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0dvb2dsZS1QaXhlbC1Qcm8tRm9sZC1TbWFydHBob25lL2RwL0IwRkZUUlpITVc_&amp;signature=AQAAAeEpuKE-uB2QQqiy8hdGKC-WcsXJWJJtX1j3fisBeuCI&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FGoogle-Pixel-Pro-Fold-Smartphone%2Fdp%2FB0FFTRZHMW" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Google-Pixel-Pro-Fold-Smartphone/dp/B0FFTRZHMW?th=1">1TB Pixel 10 Pro Folds</a> are also $300 off.</p> <span id="end-legacy-contents"></span>
<p>
 <core-commerce id="e1fffc24a4f948dc92e96aecdd89ec4d" data-type="product-list" data-original-url="https://www.amazon.com/Google-Pixel-Pro-Fold-Smartphone/dp/B0FFTR1QB3?th=1"></core-commerce></p> 
<p>We gave the Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold an <a data-i13n="cpos:7;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/mobile/smartphones/google-pixel-10-pro-fold-review-the-tankiest-foldable-170051471.html">88 in our review</a>, thanks to its improved durability, with an IP68 rating. It also has upgraded software and multitasking, along with <a data-i13n="cpos:8;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/mobile/smartphones/pixelsnap-is-googles-qi2-powered-answer-to-magsafe-for-the-pixel-10-series-160048306.html">Pixelsnap charging</a>. Plus, we found it has the &quot;best cameras of any flexible phone.&quot; One of our biggest gripes is the price — though this discount certainly helps. It&#39;s also quite a bulky device and can feel pretty heavy.&nbsp;</p> 
<p>Other Google phones are also on sale for Black Friday right now. The <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:9;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0FFTT2J6N&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=04e77a69-12b9-4933-9e48-6aafe604b9d9&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Pixel+10+Pro&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0dvb2dsZS1QaXhlbC1Qcm8tU21hcnRwaG9uZS1GYXN0LUNoYXJnaW5nL2RwL0IwRkZUVDJKNk4_&amp;signature=AQAAAVkVPpYEtbBimn4a5Ot07bokSA94ThxWQ5etLaf07dTU&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FGoogle-Pixel-Pro-Smartphone-Fast-Charging%2Fdp%2FB0FFTT2J6N" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Google-Pixel-Pro-Smartphone-Fast-Charging/dp/B0FFTT2J6N">Pixel 10 Pro</a> has dropped to a record low of $749, while the <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:10;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0FFTTL4V3&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=04e77a69-12b9-4933-9e48-6aafe604b9d9&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Pixel+10+Pro+XL&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0dvb2dsZS1QaXhlbC1Qcm8tU21hcnRwaG9uZS1GYXN0LUNoYXJnaW5nL2RwL0IwRkZUVEw0VjM_&amp;signature=AQAAAZt8GSgoiK8_fYNWpCg-eKgdLos9dYFtjMpOXYK7L51S&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FGoogle-Pixel-Pro-Smartphone-Fast-Charging%2Fdp%2FB0FFTTL4V3" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Google-Pixel-Pro-Smartphone-Fast-Charging/dp/B0FFTTL4V3">Pixel 10 Pro XL</a> with a whopping 1TB of storage is also cheaper than ever at $1,249.</p>
